data.text: @nzherald Shoving the swab up your ass has been proven to be more effective to detect covid
@nzherald ffs get a grip and get rid of horse head
@nzherald So the instructions on the government issued test kits are wrong? Two kits say to do nasal swab upwards, not backwards

@nzherald It's a pity the three different types of test I have received all have different instructions. Three kits, all issued free from the government (due to my work). All with different instructions. Only one of them states you need to angle backwards in your nose.
@nzherald Try 561 ways to get myocarditis but just one vacc1ne. https://t.co/L90SEWixfe
@nzherald Or you could just not do one, and don’t worry about it. 🤷‍♂️
@nzherald Bin, cheap Chinese shite, if you believe it, you are fully conditioned
